mean_cn: n. 可能性，投注赔率，优势，差异，不平等，几率
mean_en: the possibility that something will happen :the chance that one thing will happen instead of a different thing
short_phrase: the odds that he will win
sentence: The odds of getting double yes with those two dices is one quarter.
sentence_trans: 掷两个骰子得到两个“YES”的概率为四分之一。
